td.code: index="_introspection" component=PerProcess "data.process"=splunkd | rename "data.pid" as processId | stats last(_time) as _time, count as eventcount by processId | where eventcount > 10
index="_introspection" component=PerProcess "data.process"=splunkd | stats last(_time) as _time, count as eventcount by "data.pid" | rename "data.pid" as processId | where eventcount > 10
index="_introspection" component=PerProcess "data.process"=splunkd| stats last(_time) as _time, count as eventcount by "data.pid"| rename "data.pid" as processId | where eventcount > 10
index="_introspection" "data.process"=splunkd | transaction "data.pid"| rename "data.pid" as processId | table _time, processId, eventcount| search eventcount > 10
index="_audit" | join type=left host [search index="_audit" | stats count as eventcount by host]
index="_audit" | eventstats count as eventcount by host
index="_audit" | stats count as host_count by host | appendcols [search index="_audit" | stats count by component]
index="_audit" | eventstats count as host_count by host | stats count by component, host_count, host
